column4: is the SWAP partition necessary on an intel core2duo 2.1 Ghz, 3GB DDR2 RAM and a 5400rpm HDD???
A swap partition is never NECESSARY.  But with a system like that it will be rarely used
It will be used if you try to hibernate to disk
so does that mean system can't hibernate if there's no swap partition because I haven't made one and there is no Hibernate option as such in the shutdown menu???
